dc_title_s: Railroad distance & township map of Indiana
dc_description_s: Shows railroads, counties, townships, cities, towns, and railroad stations.; Includes Description on Indiana; 1870 census figures for counties, cities, and larger towns; Laws of Indiana; and Literary Institutions of the state along both sides of the map.; W. Roberts, sc, NY.; Entered according to Act of congress, by E.C. Bridgman, in the year 1871, in the Office of the Librarian of Congress, at Washington. Scale approximately 1:675,000.
